why_it_works: Full-bleed paper texture creates tactile/printed feel
3D paper sculpture adds depth without competing with type
Outlined pills are light but scannable
Stacked bold headline reads as title card instantly
stealable_rules: Backgrounds = dumb material, typography = smart layer
Safe-area system: tags never clip edges
Pill strokes must be machine-consistent across all cards
Headlines sit embedded in the form, not floating
Series glue: same grain scale, dot spacing, arrow placement
